en: Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间中华人民共和国中央人民政府的组成部门，负责管理全国铁路。
description.en: A constituent department of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954, responsible for managing the national railways.

en: State Administration Council of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高国家行政机关，职权相当于后来的国务院。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ during the early years of the People's Republic of China, with functions equivalent to the later State Council.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国铁道部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1954年至2013年间负责管理中国铁路事务的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council responsible for managing China's railway affairs from 1954 to 2013.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 代行全国人民代表大会的职权，通过了《中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领》和《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》，宣告了中华人民共和国的成立。
description.en: Exercised the functions of the National People's Congress, passed the 'Common Program of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference' and the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China', and declared the founding of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法
en: Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的临时宪法性文件，规定了中央人民政府的组织结构。
description.en: A provisional constitutional document in the early days of the People's Republic of China that stipulated the organizational structure of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the First National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》，标志着人民代表大会制度的确立，并选举产生了新的国家领导机构。
description.en: Passed the 'Constitution of the People's Republic of China', marking the establishment of the system of people's congresses, and elected new state leadership bodies.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法
en: Organic Law of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 规定中华人民共和国国务院组织制度和工作制度的法律。
description.en: The law that stipulates the organizational and working systems of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的执行机关，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The executive body of the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China, and the highest state administrative organ.

nodes.id: 政务院财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 政务院财政经济委员会
en: Finance and Economics Committee of the State Administration Council

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府政务院下设的负责指导国家财政经济工作的机构。
description.en: An agency under the State Administration Council of the Central People's Government responsible for guiding the state's financial and economic work.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府铁道部的前身，由中国人民革命军事委员会设立，负责统一管理解放区的铁路。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government, established by the People's Revolutionary Military Commission to unify the management of railways in the liberated areas.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在华北地区建立的行政管理机构，是中华人民共和国中央人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: An administrative body established by the Communist Party of China in North China, and one of the predecessors of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次武装冲突。
description.en: The second armed conflict between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Communist Party of China (CPC) that took place in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民革命军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家和军事家，曾任中央军委铁道部部长和中央人民政府铁道部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician and military leader, served as the Minister of the Railway Department of the Central Military Commission and the Minister of Railways of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军创始人和领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任铁道部副部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army of China, formerly served as Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任华北人民政府交通部部长、铁道部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Minister of Transport of the North China People's Government and Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾参与解放区铁道工作会议。
description.en: Chinese politician who participated in the railway work conference in the liberated areas.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任天津铁路管理局局长、铁道部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Director of the Tianjin Railway Administration Bureau and Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委铁道部的中国共产党委员会。
description.en: The Communist Party of China committee within the Railway Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 连接四川省成都市和重庆市的铁路线，是中华人民共和国成立后自主修建的第一条铁路干线。
description.en: A railway line connecting Chengdu and Chongqing in Sichuan Province, it was the first trunk railway independently built after the founding of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府第一机械工业部

zh-cn: 中央人民政府第一机械工业部
en: First Ministry of Machine Building of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期负责机械工业的中央政府部门。
description.en: The central government department responsible for the machinery industry in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 原中央人民政府铁道部下属负责机车车辆制造的机构。
description.en: The agency originally under the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government responsible for locomotive and rolling stock manufacturing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任铁道部副部长。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西南军政委员会交通部部长、铁道部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Minister of Transport of the Southwest Military and Administrative Committee and Vice Minister of Railways.

description.zh-cn: 铁路专家，曾任中央人民政府铁道部副部长。
description.en: Railway expert, served as Vice Minister of Railways of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox信息，中央人民政府铁道部是中央人民政府政务院的下属机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was a subordinate agency of the State Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府铁道部是根据《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》第十八条的规定而设置的部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was a department established in accordance with Article 18 of the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议通过了《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》。
description.en: The First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference passed the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议后，中央人民政府政务院改组为中华人民共和国国务院，中央人民政府铁道部随之结束。
description.en: After the First Session of the First National People's Congress, the State Administration Council of the Central People's Government was reorganized into the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was subsequently dissolved.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国铁道部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院成立后，将原中央人民政府铁道部改为中华人民共和国铁道部。
description.en: After the establishment of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, the former Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government was changed to the Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 政务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府铁道部在政务院财政经济委员会的指导下展开工作。
description.en: The Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government operated under the guidance of the Finance and Economics Committee of the State Administration Council.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委铁道部是中央人民政府铁道部的前身。
description.en: The Railway Department of the Central Military Commission was the predecessor of the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委铁道部是中国人民解放军中央军事委员会所辖的部门。
description.en: The Railway Department of the Central Military Commission was a department under the jurisdiction of the Central Military Commission of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 为确保铁路运输以支援解放战争，中共中央决定成立中央军委铁道部。
description.en: To ensure railway transport to support the War of Liberation, the Central Committee of the CCP decided to establish the Railway Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民革命军事委员会于1949年1月10日做出《关于成立军委铁道部的决定》。
description.en: The People's Revolutionary Military Commission issued the 'Decision on the Establishment of the Railway Department of the Military Commission' on January 10, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次全国铁路工作会议上宣布成立军委铁道部的命令。
description.en: Announced the order to establish the Railway Department of the Military Commission at the first national railway work conference.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府铁道部组织续建成渝铁路。
description.en: The Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government organized the continued construction of the Chengdu-Chongqing Railway.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府第一机械工业部

description.zh-cn: 1953年8月22日，中央人民政府铁道部将机车车辆制造局及其所属工厂划归中央人民政府第一机械工业部领导。
description.en: On August 22, 1953, the Ministry of Railways of the Central People's Government transferred the Locomotive and Rolling Stock Manufacturing Bureau and its affiliated factories to the leadership of the First Ministry of Machine Building of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 军委铁道部党委于1949年3月21日在中央军委铁道部内成立。
description.en: The Party Committee of the Railway Department of the Military Commission was established within the Railway Department of the Central Military Commission on March 21, 1949.
